name: Random Night Defense
description:
The player plays a crazy shooter who shoots completely at random and enemies of all kinds want to kill him, the objective is to get out alive by killing as many monsters as possible.

Spam the space bar to shoot more efficiently.

This short game was made in solo during 4 hours with GameMaker Studio 2.

Music credit:

Titre:  Mercury City

Auteur: HMO

Source: https://soundcloud.com/h_mo
